original_text:
And he will stretch out his hand against the north
    and destroy Assyria,
and he will make Nineveh a desolation,
    a dry waste like the desert.
korean_text: 여호와가 북쪽을 향하여 손을 펴서 앗수르를 멸하며 니느웨를 황폐하게 하여 사막 같이 메마르게 하리니

sentences.original_text: And he will stretch out his hand against the north
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 북쪽을 향해 손을 뻗을 것이요

sentences.original_text: and he will make Nineveh a desolation
a dry waste like the desert
